Please use modern designs and follow this color pallette:
Primary

- Blue: #4341FF
- Light Cyan: #BCF3FF

Secondary

- Blue-Gray Dark: #7F91BD
- Blue-Gray Light: #7A8DBA

Neutral / Background

- White: #FFFFFF
- Light Gray 1: #F6F6F6
- Light Gray 2: #F9F9F9
- Light Gray 3: #FDFDFD

Dark

- Button Black: #111111
